resources.string: Note: Maximum level of tree is 3 anything beyond that will exceed inputs are numbers(-99 to 99) only!
Note:Inputs are only Integer numbers or Letters with a length 1 Character Example: 1*1 is good but 22*jj is wrong!"
Default size of Circle is 4. Min = 4, Max = 10. String inputted will be cut to the length of 4, and Size 10 will cut to the length of 3
String inputted will be cut to the length of 2

*Seperate your data using comma (,).Data must be number from 0-999.\n*RED and MAGENTA COLOR = indicate that the data is being process.\n*BLACK COLOR = indicate that the data is already in fixed place.
